
h1. Export History

eXo Chat supports you to export and save a conversation if you want.

Begin exporting a conversation by clicking the
!ExportHistory.png!
    button on the *Conversation* window that you want to export.

# pop up will appear with two options:


!OpeningExportHistory.png!



- *Open with*: To directly open the exported file
- *Save File*: To save the exported file to your local computer.

After exporting a conversation, you will have a file logged all contents in the conversation on the selected location.
